sys_rte_eb_script_operation.script: /* Example Script (function(batch, output) { for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) { //step1: access the input variables var a = batch[i].input; //Value of the source field. //step2: Your script/code goes here. var b = a + 1; //step3: set the output for each elements output[i] = b; } })(batch, output); */ (function(batch, output) { // add your code here. })(batch, output);
